tooltip.rtt.mode.title: Long-range attack mode
warp_spindle.tooltip.0: Melee Mode: Left-click Attack: Eliminates struck entity and deduces RP equal to §b1850%§r of the target's maximum health value from the rhythm network
warp_spindle.tooltip.1: Standard Ranged Mode: Right-click Activation: Emits a particle beam that §aacquires§r the target's maximum health value, then §creduces health to zero§r. Deduces §b3500%§r of acquired value
warp_spindle.tooltip.2: Advanced Ranged Mode: Right-click Activation: Releases a particle beam causing §dinstant elimination§r of struck entities. Deduces §b4500%§r of the target's maximum health value
